scripts.build:lib: yarn install  &&  NODE_ENV=production  node build.mjs --onlyLib  &&  yarn run test
scripts.build:css: yarn install  &&  NODE_ENV=production  node build.mjs  &&  yarn run test
scripts.build: yarn run build:css  &&  NODE_ENV=production  yarn run gulp build
scripts.dev: yarn install  &&  yarn run -T concurrently -k "sleep 4 && tsc --noEmit --watch --preserveWatchOutput"  "node build.mjs --dev"  "sleep 3 && yarn run gulp watch"  "yarn run dev:server" "yarn run test:dev"
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "
Run 'yarn run publishdist' to publish this package

"  && exit 1
scripts.publish:lib: yarn run build:lib  &&  cd _npm-lib  &&  npm publish
scripts.publish:server: yarn install  &&  yarn run publish:server:assets  &&  yarn run publish:server:css
scripts.publish:server:css: yarn run publish:server:css:dev  &&  yarn run publish:server:css:prod  &&  yarn run publish:server:release
scripts.publish:server:css:prod: yarn run build:css  &&  NODE_ENV=production  yarn run gulp publishCss
scripts.publish:server:css:dev: yarn install  &&  node build.mjs  &&  yarn run gulp publishDevCss
scripts.test:dev: sleep 1  &&  (yarn run test || true)  &&  yarn run test:watch
scripts.test:watch: yarn run -T onchange '__tests/**/*.tests.js' -f add -f change -- yarn run test
